meanings.definition: A decorative fabric trim used to conceal curtain rods or hardware.
meanings.sent1: The valancing on the curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the valancing to match the color scheme of the living room.
meanings.sent3: The valancing on the curtains made them look like they were wearing fancy hats.
meanings.sent4: The valancing danced along the edge of the curtains, hiding the plain rods beneath.
meanings.sent5: The intricate valancing made the curtains look like they were wearing a beautiful skirt.

meanings.definition: The act of adding a valance to a window treatment.
meanings.sent1: Her valancing of the windows transformed the room into a cozy retreat.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of valancing from his grandmother, who was a skilled seamstress.
meanings.sent3: The valancing of the windows turned into a fun DIY project for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: She approached valancing the windows with precision, ensuring a perfect fit.
meanings.sent5: The valancing of the windows was like adding a crown to the room, making it feel complete.
